description._content: [Private Charles Chapman of Company A, 10th Virginia Cavalry Regiment, left, and unidentified soldier] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : half-plate ambrotype, hand-colored ; 15.1 x 12.1 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff.
